TextLibrary.Text: Drong
Mmm... Dragon spider was yummy. Drong thinks that a Troll would be nice though.

Mmm... Dragon spider was yummy. Drong thinks that a Troll would be nice though.
A Troll? But they're everywhere. Surely you've eaten Troll before?

Regular Troll, yes. But Drong talk to Goblin Merchant named Neehi, and he tell Drong about rare Ice Troll.
Regular Troll, yes. But Drong talk to Goblin Merchant named Neehi, and he tell Drong about rare Ice Troll.

An Ice Troll?
An Ice Troll?
An Ice Troll?
An Ice Troll?
Mmmm... lives up north near Theira. You get one for Drong to eat and Drong give you magic stick.

A magic stick, huh? Well, I'll get right onto it.
